mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT P.*,RT.*,M.NAME,FIND_CD(RES_TIME) REST, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESER R WHERE R.RES_DATE = TO_DATE(#{redate},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RT.RES_TIME =R.RES_TIME AND R.PTG_ID = P.PTG_ID) RESYN FROM PHOTOGRAPHER P, RESER_TIME RT, MEMBER M WHERE M.ID = P.PTG_ID AND P.PTG_ID ＝ RT.PTG_ID AND P.PTG_ID = #{ptgId}
SELECT DISTINCT O.*, P.*, M.* FROM OPTIONS O, PHOTOGRAPHER P, MEMBER M WHERE M.ID = P.PTG_ID AND P.PTG_ID = O.PTG_ID AND P.PTG_ID = #{ptgId} ORDER BY O.PRI

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT DISTINCT NVL(Z.ZZIMSS,0) ZZIMS,P.*, M.*,S.ST_NAME,A.PHO_RT, A.PHO_NUM,PT.UP_STA,PT.PORT_DATE,PT.PORT_NUM FROM PHOTOGRAPHER P, MEMBER M,STUDIO S,(SELECT CTGR_NUM,COUNT(*) ZZIMSS FROM ZZIM GROUP BY CTGR_NUM) Z, (SELECT PHO_RT, PHO_NUM, CTGR_NUM FROM PHOTO WHERE PHO_NUM IN (SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(PHO_NUM)) FROM PHOTO WHERE UPPER(CTGR) = 'P' GROUP BY CTGR_NUM) ORDER BY PHO_NUM) A, PORTFOLIO PT WHERE P.PTG_ID = M.ID AND PT.PTG_ID = P.PTG_ID AND A.CTGR_NUM = PT.PORT_NUM AND M.ID = Z.CTGR_NUM(+) AND P.ST_ID = S.ST_ID(+) AND P.PTG_ID = #{ptgId} AND UPPER(PT.UP_STA)='Y' ORDER BY PORT_DATE DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 6) B WHERE RN >= 1
